00024 #ifndef _FLOOD_H_
00025 #define _FLOOD_H_

00027 #include <list>
00028 
00029 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00030 #include "BaseNetwLayer.h"
00031 #include "SimpleAddress.h"

00052 class MIXIM_API Flood : public BaseNetwLayer
00053 {
00054 protected:
00056     unsigned long seqNum;
00057 
00059     int defaultTtl;
00060 
00062     bool plainFlooding;
00063 
00064     class Bcast {
00065     public:
00066         unsigned long    seqNum;
00067         LAddress::L3Type srcAddr;
00068         simtime_t        delTime;
00069     public:
00070         Bcast(unsigned long n=0, const LAddress::L3Type& s = LAddress::L3NULL,  simtime_t_cref d=SIMTIME_ZERO) :
00071             seqNum(n), srcAddr(s), delTime(d) {
00072         }
00073     };
00074 
00075     typedef std::list<Bcast> cBroadcastList;
00076 
00078     cBroadcastList bcMsgs;
00079 
00084     unsigned int bcMaxEntries;
00085 
00090     simtime_t bcDelTime;
00091 
00092 public:
00093     Flood()
00094       : BaseNetwLayer()
00095       , seqNum(0)
00096       , defaultTtl(0)
00097       , plainFlooding(false)
00098       , bcMsgs()
00099       , bcMaxEntries(0)
00100       , bcDelTime()
00101       , nbDataPacketsReceived(0)
00102       , nbDataPacketsSent(0)
00103       , nbDataPacketsForwarded(0)
00104       , nbHops(0)
00105     {}
00106 
00108     virtual void initialize(int);
00109     virtual void finish();    
00110 
00111 protected:
00112 
00113     long nbDataPacketsReceived;
00114     long nbDataPacketsSent;
00115     long nbDataPacketsForwarded;
00116     long nbHops;
00117 
00119     virtual void handleUpperMsg(cMessage *);
00120 
00122     virtual void handleLowerMsg(cMessage *);
00123 
00125     virtual void handleSelfMsg(cMessage* /*msg*/) {};
00126     
00128     bool notBroadcasted( NetwPkt* );
00129 
00130     //overloading encaps method
00131     virtual NetwPkt* encapsMsg(cPacket*);
00132 };
